entries.name: pris_talk_1
entries.speaker: QT7JBf1X9NUUSTG
entries.text: <#cedde2>I am just standing here to welcome other villagers to Darwin... Easy enough job!

entries.name: mia_1
entries.speaker: bcSbmXBI9eJYyus
entries.text: <#cedde2>Hello! I am Mia, a wandering merchant. I am organizing my stuff to sell. Soon you will be able to buy stuff from me!

entries.name: froggy_1
entries.speaker: TuF69LVgqZb1Sqd
entries.text: <#cedde2>Festivals! I am Froggy, a festival enthusiast! I will let you know if there are any events happening!

entries.name: lewis_1
entries.speaker: MS3s07BsDckBpd8
entries.text: <#cedde2>Enjoying your stay here, %player_name%? Our town is a small one, so I believe you can cozy up yourself fast!

entries.name: liana_1
entries.speaker: TZjx1KZnYN0x2HM
entries.text: <#cedde2>Clothes, clothes, clothes! I am organizing the closet, soon you will be able to wear cosmetics!

entries.name: kurt_1
entries.speaker: QE0c8wh6CMtMrFc
entries.text: <#cedde2>In a hurry, huh? Jump on that hot air balloon and I will fly you to the destination, fast!

entries.name: darcy_1
entries.speaker: mBoMa7t8zeIzifA
entries.text: <#cedde2>You must remain vigilant in that place! Life and death is only apart by a small thread in there.

entries.name: anika_1
entries.speaker: TYkN8EEaSNS0JrE
entries.text: <#cedde2>Coins overflowing in your purse? You have come to the right place, let's get to your bank account!

entries.name: blacksmith_talk_1
entries.text: <#cedde2>Greetings! Do you have any items you wanna forge? Leave it to me, your weapons gonna be shiny and all!
entries.speaker: kwjEWI9oHgNtaYP
